sentences.en: Defeated in that, his enemies resorted to a more devious method.
sentences.cn: 他的敌人在这方面失败以后, 便采取了更不正当的手法.

sentences.en: He got rich by devious means.
He got rich by devious means.
sentences.cn: 他靠不正当手段发了财.

sentences.en: He had been devious and two-faced.
sentences.cn: 他从前向来都是阴险狡猾，口是心非。

sentences.en: He was as devious as his adversary was ruthless.
sentences.cn: 他的对手冷酷,他也同样阴险.

sentences.en: He was extremely devious in his efforts to achieve his heart's desire.
sentences.cn: 他在设法得到自己的中意之物时会不择手段。

sentences.en: His success had come by devious methods , had been reached by obscure means.
sentences.cn: 他的成功,是凭着不正当的伎俩而取得的, 是用见不得人的手段来达到的.

sentences.en: Let's take the devious route home to avoid the crowds in the main roads.
sentences.cn: 为了避免大街上的拥挤,我们还是绕道回家去吧.

sentences.en: Modern sleuthing can overcome some of the most devious destruction.
sentences.cn: 现代的侦探工作能化解一些最为狡猾的破坏手段.

sentences.en: Newman was devious, prepared to say one thing in print and another in private.
sentences.cn: 纽曼阴险得很，明里一套，暗里一套。

sentences.en: Other, more devious, patterns became clear when I knew about the taping.
sentences.cn: 我知道了录音的事之后, 就清楚了其他更为迂回曲折的手腕.

sentences.en: She is devious and sly and manipulative.
She led him by devious ways to the meeting place.
sentences.cn: 她绕来绕去地把他带到会面地点.

sentences.en: Susan is a devious person and we can't depend on her.
sentences.cn: 苏姗是个狡猾的人,我们不能依赖她.

sentences.en: There is something devious about him.

words.tran_cn: 偏僻的；弯曲的；不光明正大的

trans.tran_cn: 迂回的，曲折的，不光明正大的，不正直的，不坦诚的，狡猾的，不正当
trans.tran_en: using dishonest tricks and deceiving people in order to get what you want
